                              float y,
                              int tileWidth,
                              int tileHeight,
                              processing.core.PApplet s)
        Draws the object using the Processing PApplet
        Parameters:
        x - The X position in terms of tiles
        y - The Y position in terms of tiles
        tileWidth - The width of each tile
        tileHeight - The height of each tile

      • setPos

        public void setPos(float posX,
                   float posY)
        This method sets the new position of the game object!
        Parameters:
        posX - this is the x position of the game object. MUST BE A VALID FLOAT VALUE WITHIN THE MAP
        posY - this is the y position of the game object. MUST BE A VALID FLOAT VALUE WITHIN THE MAP
